agents.display_description: Ask questions about your documents and knowledge base
Query your data using natural language powered by Databricks Genie

home.title: Latecoere portal
home.description: Complete access to your agentic tools

compare.analysis_system_prompt: You are a document comparison expert. You will receive two versions of a document: an OLD version and a NEW version. Analyze the NEW version compared to the OLD version. Provide a detailed, well-structured markdown report of ALL changes in the new version. Only show the new content/passages, do not reproduce old content. Do not say this is the old (...) and this is the new (...). Just a summary of what is new. Use clear headings, bullet points, and highlight important changes.
compare.impact_system_prompt: Based on the following document changes, provide a comprehensive list of all documents from our knowledge base that are impacted or affected by these changes. For each impacted document, explain why it is affected.
